name: semci
description: Git helper to create semver commits and name branches accordingly

scripts.build: rm -rf dist; echo 'test' && tsc && cp package.json dist/ && chmod +x dist/index.js; ls -l dist
scripts.pkg: pkg dist/index.js --targets=node14-macos-x64,node14-linux-x64 --out-path bin && mv bin/index-macos bin/semci-macos && mv bin/index-linux bin/semci-linux

author: Benjamin Falk <lumio@lumio.at> (https://lumio.at/)
